mapper.select:
SELECT xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_id, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_table, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_ctime, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_mtime, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_userinfo_id, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_remark, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_generator_forbidtable xt_generator_forbidtable LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_remark like '%${xt_generator_f_remark}%'
AND xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_table like '%${xt_generator_f_table}%'

SELECT xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_id, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_table, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_ctime, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_mtime, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_userinfo_id, xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_remark, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_generator_forbidtable xt_generator_forbidtable LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_generator_forbidtable.xt_generator_f_id=#{xt_generator_forbidtable_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_generator_forbidtable ( xt_generator_f_id, xt_generator_f_table, xt_generator_f_ctime, xt_userinfo_id, xt_generator_f_remark ) VALUES ( #{xt_generator_f_id}, #{xt_generator_f_table}, #{xt_generator_f_ctime}, #{xt_userinfo_id}, #{xt_generator_f_remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_generator_forbidtable SET xt_generator_f_id = #{xt_generator_f_id}, xt_generator_f_table = #{xt_generator_f_table}, xt_generator_f_mtime = #{xt_generator_f_mtime}, xt_userinfo_id = #{xt_userinfo_id}, xt_generator_f_remark = #{xt_generator_f_remark} WHERE xt_generator_f_id=#{xt_generator_f_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_generator_forbidtable WHERE xt_generator_f_id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO xt_generator_forbidtable ( xt_generator_f_id, xt_generator_f_table, xt_generator_f_ctime, xt_userinfo_id, xt_generator_f_remark ) VALUES
( #{item.xt_generator_f_id}, #{item.xt_generator_f_table}, #{item.xt_generator_f_ctime}, #{item.xt_userinfo_id}, #{item.xt_generator_f_remark} )

update.foreach: UPDATE xt_generator_forbidtable SET xt_generator_f_id = #{item.xt_generator_f_id}, xt_generator_f_table = #{item.xt_generator_f_table}, xt_generator_f_mtime = #{item.xt_generator_f_mtime}, xt_userinfo_id = #{item.xt_userinfo_id}, xt_generator_f_remark = #{item.xt_generator_f_remark} WHERE xt_generator_f_id=#{item.xt_generator_f_id}
